Articles.Content:
Hi,

I just stumbled upon an action on the LV-909 (haven't checked other engines yet) which is called Jettison. And it does nothing when binding to an Action Group. So what is it for?
Yeah, it has been there a while but I don't know what it does.
It may be related to the shroud that appears when you place another part under the engine.

It may be related to the shroud that appears when you place another part under the engine.

I think so too but the shroud jettisons when you decouple the part under it any way.
Just tried with a shroud, nothing happens. Maybe a left over from the automatic shroud jettison there.

All the engines seem to have it, only the LV-N one is useful. It's basically a fairing but looks cool. I made this:

In action groups, you will see 2 jettisons, one for each side

It's mostly a hold over functionality for when fairings came off in a slightly different manner. There is still a setting for the fairing in the part.cfg file which will make the fairing stick to the engine instead of a decoupler. In which case, you would need to jettison it. (Although in that instance, they also self jettison when staging the engine.)

Cheers,

-Claw
